reporter_caption.center: QUAKERTOWN BRICK AND TILE CO. v. BAUMANN, 304 Pa. Super. 607 (1982)

caption.center: Quakertown Brick and Tile Co., Inc., v. Baumann.
Appeal of Erie Indemnity Co., Attorney-in-Fact for subscribers at Erie

opinion.posture: Civil proceedings. Trespass. Before WIEAND, J. No. 2291 Philadelphia 1980. Appeal from the order of the CourtPage 608 of Common Pleas of Lehigh County, Civil Division, No. 863, Jan. T., 1975. Argued February 3, 1981.
opinion.attorneys: Michael P. Shay, for appellant; David G. Welty, for Quakertown, appellee; David Baumann, appellee, in propria persona.
opinion.panel: Before WICKERSHAM, POPOVICH and WATKINS, JJ.
